CHEESE SUB, MOZZARELLA SHREDDED VEGAN BULK BAG REF

recipeMethods.stepInstructions:
1. Combine Creole mustard and vegan mayo.

2. Place spread in a squeeze bottle and set aside. Hold at 41°F or below until ready for service.

3. Drain sliced pickles and place in a perforated hotel pan with a 
solid pan underneath. Cover and store at 41°F or below until ready for use.

1. Preheat impinger over to 500°F, and set belt time to 1 minute 20 
seconds.

2. Cut torpedo roll in half, lengthwise.

3. Using the squeeze bottle, put 1 oz Creole mustard-mayo spread on the 
bottom half of the roll.

4. Place a prepared boca patty over the spread.

5. Place 2 oz shredded vegan mozzarella on top of the sandwich.

6. Place the sandwich on screen and toast in impinger.

7. Remove sandwich from the impinger and place 1 long dill pickle slice 
on top of the cheese.

8. Using the squeeze bottle, put 1 oz Creole mustard mayo on top half 
of the roll, and close the sandwich.

9. Place sandwich in a to-go box and serve.
